title: Usage Analytics
description: Sync and visualize aggregated usage history across accounts, with export support.

settings.enabledHint: When enabled, the extension stores bounded daily aggregates (no raw logs).
settings.alarmUnsupported: Alarms API is not supported in this browser; cron-like scheduling is unavailable.

filters.sitesHint: Pick a subset of sites (empty selection means all).
filters.accountsHint: Pick a subset of accounts (empty selection means all within selected sites).
filters.tokensHint: Optional token filter derived from usage-history aggregates (empty selection means all within selected accounts).

empty.title: No usage history data yet
empty.description: Enable sync in Settings → Account usage, then click "Sync now" to pull recent usage history.

syncTab.settingsDescription: Configure how aggregated usage history is stored and scheduled.
syncTab.stateDescription: View per-account sync state and the last sync timestamp.

table.empty: No accounts match the current search.

dailyOverview.title: Daily overview
dailyOverview.description: Multi-metric trends with tooltip and zoom.

dailyRequests.title: Daily requests
dailyRequests.description: Fused request counts across selected accounts.

dailyTokens.title: Daily tokens
dailyTokens.description: Fused token usage (prompt + completion) across selected accounts.

dailyQuota.title: Daily quota consumption
dailyQuota.description: Fused quota consumption across selected accounts.

modelDistribution.title: Model distribution
modelDistribution.description: Top models by total tokens in the selected date range.
modelDistribution.empty: No model data for the current selection.

modelCostDistribution.title: Model cost distribution
modelCostDistribution.description: Top models by quota consumption (converted to USD) in the selected date range.

accountComparison.title: Per-account comparison
accountComparison.description: Compare totals across accounts for the current selection.

usageTimeHeatmap.title: Usage time heatmap
usageTimeHeatmap.description: Total tokens aggregated by weekday and hour (local time).

modelHeatmap.title: Model × day heatmap
modelHeatmap.description: Token usage intensity over time for top models (click a model to focus).

latencyHistogram.title: Latency distribution
latencyHistogram.description: Histogram of per-request latency (`use_time`) for the current selection.

latencyTrend.title: Latency trend
latencyTrend.description: Daily avg/max latency and slow counts.

slowModels.title: Slow models
slowModels.description: Models with the most slow requests in the current selection.

slowTokens.title: Slow tokens
slowTokens.description: API tokens with the most slow requests in the current selection.

status.title: Sync status
status.description: Per-account sync status and last sync timestamp.

error.exportNoData: No data to export for the current selection
